text: “Although Donald Trump won Georgia by just 211,000 votes in 2016, some 900,000 eligible black people stayed home, a majority of them Atlanta residents... We need the courage to act on a scale we’ve never seen before.” -@nseufot https://t.co/W6JrVQNlaq
